item.title: [562] Theiving
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“soccerjunki21, post:5, topic:362886”]how do i set the cash amount i tryed adding

995, 4000 , restofthe code[/quote]

Go into the player class and search ‘thief’ and it should pull up

public void thief(blah blah) {
         //Code
}

& in the parameters (where it says blah blah) should be a brief desc. of what should be there.
Example

public void add(int num1, int num2) {
        int res1 =  num1+num2;
        System.out.println("result of "+num1+" & "+num2+" is "+res1);
}

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Theiving
item.dc:creator: @soccerjunki21 soccerjunki21
item.description:
@soccerjunki21 wrote:

someone please help everytime someone steals from a stall they get 1 gp
im using rs2hd

il give u a code from object class

case -31154: player.thief(995, 4, 30, 5000, "You steal some money."); break; case -31153: player.thief(995, 4, 20, 2500, "You steal some money."); break; case -31152: player.thief(995, 4, 50, 7500, "You steal some money."); break; case -31151: player.thief(995, 4, 75, 10000, "You steal some money."); break; case -31149: player.thief(995, 4, 35, 4300, "You steal some money."); break; case -31150: player.thief(995, 4, 65, 6000, "You steal some money."); break;

don’t say remove the - before the case id cause those are the object ids
oh and the stealstall does not work
Thanks
Soccerjunki
